summary: Comprehensive testing of GuessIt Football Prediction Platform completed. Backend API endpoints are working correctly with 80% success rate. Frontend pages load properly with all expected UI components.

validation_issues.issue: Registration requires confirm_password field but returns 422 without it
validation_issues.impact: Frontend might not be sending confirm_password field
validation_issues.note: This is expected behavior - frontend should include confirm_password

integration_issues.issue: WebSocket connection to matches endpoint fails with 401

passed_tests: Backend health check endpoint (/api/health) returns healthy status
Root API endpoint (/api/) returns 'GuessIt API is running'
Get current user (/api/auth/me) returns 401 when not authenticated
News endpoint (/api/news) returns response with articles array
Subscription plans (/api/subscriptions/plans) returns 3 plans (Standard, Champion, Elite)
Football matches endpoint (/api/football/matches) returns response with matches array
Contact settings endpoint (/api/contact-settings) returns all required fields
Admin login works with admin@guessit.com / Admin123!
Frontend homepage loads with header, banner carousel, match tabs, and league filters
Frontend login page (/login) loads with email, password, Google OAuth, and register link
Frontend register page (/register) loads with email, password, confirm password, and login link
Frontend admin login page (/itguess/admin/login) loads with admin-specific branding
Frontend leaderboard page (/leaderboard) loads with ranking table and user data
